890:3: tvaṃ buddhastvaṃ ca dharmo daśabalatanayastvaṃ tathā bodhisattva-
890:4: stvaṃ bhikṣuḥ śrāvakastvaṃ kuliśavaradharastvaṃ tathā dharmadhātuḥ |
890:5: tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ pramathagaṇapatistvaṃ mahendro yamastvaṃ
890:6: tvaṃ pāśī tvaṃ dhaneśastvamanalapavanau nairṛtastvaṃ maheśaḥ ||2 ||
890:10: annaṃ ratnaṃ ca sarvaṃ matirati mahatī naḥ sadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 3 ||
890:11: pañcajñānena buddhān sṛjasi svayamatho bodhisattvāṃśca pañca-
890:13: sarveṣāṃ cetasi stho naṭayasi sakalaṃ sarvato rakṣako'si
890:14: tvaṃ bījaṃ cāṅkurastvaṃ phalamapi viṭapī sarvadā tvāṃ natāḥ smaḥ || 4 ||
890:15: śreṣṭhaṃ kṣatraṃ tvamasmin prabhavasi bhagavān sarvataḥ sarvadevān
890:17: dvīpeṣvanyeṣvapi tvaṃ vibhajasi sakalaṃ jyotiṣāṃ saṃvibhāgam
890:20: dṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ sarvamidaṃ bhavantaṃ manyāmahe tvāṃ praṇatāḥ sma nityam || 6 ||
